name: VerificatieStatusCodelijst_to_ConditionVerificationStatus
title: VerificatieStatusCodelijst to ConditionVerificationStatus
description: Maps VerificationStatus codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Problem v4.4 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Problem-v4.4(2020EN)) to ConditionVerificationStatus codes as found in FHIR R4.

target.comment: Unknown doesn't specify any relevant clinical information and means that nothing is known of the verification status while unconfirmed provides some clinical meaning, namely that the condition is not yet confirmed.
